description: Shows an audit of letter printing in Customer Relationship Management records.

columns.name: COMM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the communication record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NOTE_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of a printed letter.

columns.name: PRINT_DATETIME
columns.description: The date and time when the letter was printed in UTC format.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the user who printed the letter
